Warrior.description: Warriors are brave and resilient defenders!
Warrior.specialDescription: Defend your party until your next turn.

Mage.description: Mages wield powerful magicks to damage or heal!
Mage.specialDescription: Heal your party with restorative starlight.

Rogue.description: Rogues are speedy fighters, capable of multi-attacks!
Rogue.specialDescription: Strike all enemies with electrified shots.
